src.model.movement_recognition.infront module¶

src.model.movement_recognition.jump module¶

class src.model.movement_recognition.jump.Jump¶

Bases: object

The Jump Class is used to sense whether or the body in frame is jumping or not You need to call this class again once instanciated to update the data.

read¶

whether or not the body is jumping or not

Type:

bool

magnitude¶

speed over the threshold

Type:

int

__call__(kinect

PyKinectV2, body: PyKinectRuntime.KinectBody) -> None: updates the read according to whether or not the body is jumping or not.

get_speed_threshhold() → int¶

get the speed threashold needed to be reached to allow a jump to be recognised

set_speed_threshhold(x

int) -> None: set the speed threashold needed to be reached to allow a jump to be recognised.

get_speed_threshhold() → int¶

Gets the speed threashold needed to be reached to allow a jump to be recognised.

Returns:

the speed threashold needed to be reached to allow a jump to be recognised.

Return type:

int

set_speed_threshhold(x: int) → None¶

Sets the speed threashold needed to be reached to allow a jump to be recognised.

Parameters:

x (int) – the new speed threashold needed to be reached to allow a jump to be recognised.

class src.model.movement_recognition.raiselegs.RaiseLeftLeg¶

Bases: object

The LeftWalk Class is used to sense whether or the body in frame has its left calf rased or not. You need to call this class again once instanciated to update the data.

whether or not the body has its left calf rased or not

Type:

bool

magnitude¶

angle over the threshold

Type:

int

__call__(kinect

src.model.movement_recognition.turnhips module¶

class src.model.movement_recognition.turnhips.TurnHips¶

Bases: object

The TurnHips Class is used to sense whether or the body in frame is has its hips turned or not. You need to call this class again once instanciated to update the data.

readleft¶

whether or not the left hip is back or not

Type:

bool

readright¶

whether or not the right hip is back or not

Type:

bool

__call__(kinect

PyKinectV2, body: PyKinectRuntime.KinectBody) -> None: updates the read according to whether or not the body has its hips turned or not.

get_diff_threshhold() → int¶

get the difference threashold needed to be reached to allow a hip turn to be recognised

set_diff_threshhold(x

int) -> None: set the difference threashold needed to be reached to allow a hip turn to be recognised.

get_diff_threshhold() → int¶

Gets the difference threashold needed to be reached to allow a hip turn to be recognised.

Returns:

the difference threashold needed to be reached to allow a hip turn to be recognised.

Return type:

set_diff_threshhold(x: int) → None¶
